item.description:
Buddha's Birthday. Celebrate the buddhist holiday, Flower Festival, called Hanamatsuri in Japanese, honoring the birth of the historical Buddha Shakyamuni over 2,500 years ago. Please bring an offering of a flower(s) for the baby buddha. Includes a special visual reading and discussion of the birth story. This also the 8th year anniversary of the founding of our religious community All friends and guests are invited. Great for families.

Remember bring a flower as an offering to the Buddha.

See our main web site:

www.bffct.net
item.how_to_find_us: Mansfield Freeman Center is towards the end of the road next to cementary.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Buddha's Birthday Celebration
